sentences.en: Excuse me, can you tell me where the roller coaster is?
sentences.cn: 打扰了, 你能告诉我哪里有过山车 吗 ?

sentences.en: For speed and thrills, nothing beats a roller coaster ride.
sentences.cn: 谈到速度与惊魂体验, 云霄飞车所向无敌.

sentences.en: He had a white - knuckle ride on a roller coaster.
sentences.cn: 他坐了一次令他胆战心惊的云霄飞车.

sentences.en: I've been on an emotional roller-coaster since I've been here.
sentences.cn: 自从我到了这里，情绪就起伏不定。

sentences.en: It's great to go on the roller coaster five times and not be sick.
sentences.cn: 坐了5次云霄飞车都没晕，真是太棒了。

sentences.en: Leah went on the coaster and the river rafting ride with daddy.
sentences.cn: 姐姐和爸爸还坐了过山车和漂流,结果弄得浑身都湿透了.

sentences.en: My greatest thrill is going on the roller coaster.
sentences.cn: 我觉得最刺激的事就是坐过山车.

sentences.en: Quite simply, it was a spectacular aerial roller - coaster ride of high exhilaration.
sentences.cn: 简言之, 这是一次美妙的、极度兴奋的空中环滑车旅行.

sentences.en: She turned green when she came off the roller coaster.
sentences.cn: 当她从云霄飞车上下来时,脸色发青.

sentences.en: So the roller coaster ride continued up and down.
sentences.cn: 这样,过山车继续上下飞转.

sentences.en: Tell me who was sitting next to you on the roller coaster!
sentences.cn: 告诉我谁在过山车上坐在你旁边!

sentences.en: The economy has been on a roller coaster all year.
sentences.cn: 全年的经济状态起伏不定.

sentences.en: The last few weeks have been a real roller coaster.
sentences.cn: 过去的几个星期，形势真是变幻莫测。

sentences.en: The new roller coaster ride amusement park frightened the pants off me.
sentences.cn: 乘坐公园里那辆新的滑行铁道车吓得偶魂飞魄散.

sentences.en: The ride on the roller coaster dizzied us.
sentences.cn: 乘坐云霄飞车使我们头晕.

words.tran_cn: 向海岸地；朝着海岸地（等于coastwards）
沿岸贸易船；杯托，小托盘；雪橇

phrases.tran_cn: 过山车；云霄飞车；情绪急转突变

trans.tran_en: A coaster is a small mat that you put underneath a glass or cup to protect the surface of a table
